TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IImageStoreProgressHandler

summary.para: Defines the behavior that a progress handler must implement to process progress information from Image Store operations

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.TimeSpan GetUpdateInterval() cil managed

summary.para: Retrieves the interval at which progress information is published for some details that use polling (such as application package upload and download progress). Returning zero will use the system default of 2 seconds.

returns.para: The representing the progress update interval.

MemberSignature.Value: public void UpdateProgress (long completedItems, long totalItems, System.Fabric.ProgressUnitType itemType);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void UpdateProgress(int64 completedItems, int64 totalItems, valuetype System.Fabric.ProgressUnitType itemType) cil managed

Docs.param: The number of completed work items.
The total number of work items.
The unit of measurement for each work item.

summary.para: Reports the progress of the current operation

Docs.remarks: The total number of items is not always guaranteed to be known at the beginning of the operation. In some cases, this value can increase if more work is discovered during processing.
